body:
You need to print your downloaded PDF on A4 paper, with one printed side per page. You don’t need to sign any of the printed documents.

The downloaded PDF includes:

- 3 copies of your application form (also known as the C100) - the court will send 1 copy to the other person, keep 1 copy, and return 1 copy to you
- instructions for posting and payment (you can ignore the payment instructions if you have a ‘Help with fees’ reference)

If you can’t open the PDF, try using Adobe Acrobat Reader. You can [download Adobe Reader]({app:urls:url:adobe-reader}) for free.

(i) The printed PDF will be between 40-60 pages.
heading: 1. Print your application
